snippet: This weekend in Greenwich Village, the New York Studio of Drawing, Painting and Sculpture will allow visitors to view the original Whitney Museum inscription before it is covered again.
abstract: New York Studio School of Drawing, Painting and Sculpture is welcoming visitors keen to catch glimpse of original Whitney Museum of American Art, salmon-pink stucco facade of which was revealed after completion of school's $450,000 restoration project; visitors will also be able to tour studio where Gertrude Vanderbilt Whitney worked.
lead_paragraph: This weekend in Greenwich Village, the New York Studio of Drawing, Painting and Sculpture will allow visitors to view the original Whitney Museum inscription before it is covered again.

headline.main: A Trace of the Original Whitney Museum Reappears
headline.print_headline: Trace of the Whitney Museum’s Birthplace Reappears in the Village
